strings.Value: "I understand, how... difficult it is to forgive me, and accept me into your circle again. I'm not asking or expecting this from you."
"And right. Now you better keep quiet while you are still alive."
"I've been wondering why you did what you did. It's an understatement to say that we were all stunned! You can't undo what you've done, but still... You know, I'm glad you're back with us."
"It's easier to fix a broken egg than return the trust you've lost. But time can do strange things."
"Eh, don't worry. You showed me that if I stab someone in the back, they'll let me back in! Longshanks and halfshanks â€“ ha! So gullible."
